changes.change: Fixed an error with permissions on tweak data files which caused multiple imports, no imports and other weird bugs
Added a lot more logging and logging to file (warning: only use for short periods if you have a problem, the file can get big)
Added code that runs on first run and removes all duplicated ringtones and makes sure needed files and folders exist.
Fixed an error when that occurs the Ringtone directory does not already exist
Fixed a bug where it required a restart of Preferences to run import again.
Added contact buttons to preference pane
